title: JohnnoDwarf 's Awesomesauce Art Array
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:unusual-cargo]]

[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

+++ Hi there! I'm JohnnoDwarf , debuting with my art and this is my list of stuff-- 
--
+++ Won't keep ya long, pictures are listed from newest to oldest, click the collapsibles and //hopefully// they make your eyes feel just that little bit better.
 
 --
+++ Enjoy!
 
---
[[collapsible show="+ SCP-4231-2 doodle" hide="- The Lady"
> [[image https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773594c2.wixmp.com/f/5bb8db6d-0550-411b-a51e-24b51e9b6cf0/djiq6tw-a5088cbd-0556-46b4-baff-fef37a0920c3.png?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..3Gf47WpsdyPZW3ZpL4oVwDD4zkbsuyAHZPnvhxwsOOE]]
> -
> Doodle for a design of this girl
> -
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+ SCP-6320-2 ‘Dumptruck’" hide="- “Dumptruck, shake!”"
> [[image https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773594c2.wixmp.com/f/5bb8db6d-0550-411b-a51e-24b51e9b6cf0/djiq72q-765c1f4d-4b91-474a-885c-327126bf70b0.gif?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..DPBaHUCRxBQBGfHJYMEHdXaNFyj7c3-56BR1w_-6bP4.gif]]
> -
> I’m figuring out how to have the gif play on the page, I’ll fix this soon
> -
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+ Hiway Robbery Colour - Find Us Alive" hide="- I’m dash two-ing it, I’m dash two-ing it so hard oh yeah"]]
> [[image https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773594c2.wixmp.com/f/5bb8db6d-0550-411b-a51e-24b51e9b6cf0/djiq6j2-6e372bcc-ad23-4666-b560-331b884ea651.png?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..mex1LYuhgK1cZvJRdR1VteT4rpRAfyDeWfdnsCK92cw]]
> -
> I’m a very reptilian person in general and that definitely shows in my Hiway design I think.
> -
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+ Hiway Robbery Lineart - Find Us Alive" hide="- This guy hurts me to draw ngl"]]
> [[image https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773594c2.wixmp.com/f/5bb8db6d-0550-411b-a51e-24b51e9b6cf0/djiq6jm-f114ea49-d2d9-4cc0-ad89-1959e61f63ce.png?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..xlncmIA7yN82XySRwdCRx6oFuhrGhIysPSP2Xr5y7Xc]]
> -
> I’m a big fan of this fella and I don’t feel there’s enough of him out there. The proportions on this one probably aren’t quite right but that’s alright.
> -
[[/collapsible]]

 [[collapsible show="+ SCP-105 & SCP-166 little silly" hide="- Iris gets her hand on that long bacon from the long bacon store"]]
> [[image https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773594c2.wixmp.com/f/5bb8db6d-0550-411b-a51e-24b51e9b6cf0/djiq6a4-c6cfa20d-6a83-4bfe-a184-c4cbd93a1d91.png/v1/fill/w_1074,h_744,q_70,strp/105___166_long_bacon_store_by_johnnodwarf_djiq6a4-pre.jpg?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..P0lBFZ9Gkt3aYmuEgDxZyUQ8cfUNW9ijbm1xi76YK2o]]
> -
> GAYYYY
> -
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+ SCP-4231 - Lilly" hide="- Ohh she's so vile"]]
> [[image https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773594c2.wixmp.com/f/5bb8db6d-0550-411b-a51e-24b51e9b6cf0/dj5ypw3-5cc2e9f8-bf20-4815-8964-89d953c0554f.png?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..PtYgK8DWhcMzCNX7BDxEit9VorTlO-WrJUdP_FvdhrM]]
> -
> I finally got around to reading this one, didn't know what to expect really. Needless to say the only proper thing to do was stay up until 5AM until I made something worthy of what I was feeling!
> - 
[[/collapsible]]
 
[[collapsible show="+ SCP-4231 - Lineart" hide="- Thought I'd include it as a little extra"]]
> [[image https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773594c2.wixmp.com/f/5bb8db6d-0550-411b-a51e-24b51e9b6cf0/dj5ypwh-0f235322-af5a-41a1-bf83-2b39a319c54a.png/v1/fill/w_1280,h_1280,q_80,strp/4231_line_art_by_johnnodwarf_dj5ypwh-fullview.jpg?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..CdS9zzAzrnqRLINk0on2HssFLsJnp7zbatoCF79w2gE]]
> -
> Not much to say, pure black isn't usually something I employ but I find myself using it for SCP art specifically. Feels appropriate. 
> -
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+ Another SCP-4231 piece, this one just a sketch" hide="- But she doesn't end up telling him,"]]
> [[image https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773594c2.wixmp.com/f/5bb8db6d-0550-411b-a51e-24b51e9b6cf0/dj5ypwy-5f0ba330-0fa7-434a-846d-fa1acc9a6b19.jpg?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..mG5-jbZQWH4zw4plUzkMDooXJLF2VaeTkelfeE2HDD8]]
> -
> I tried for a while to draw the moment Clef actually fired. I couldn't quite get anything to work at the time, but here's an alright-looking sketch of the aftermath. 
> -
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+ Nari Love and Hiway Robbery - Find Us Alive" hide="- Wait FUA is allowed right? Oh god oh"]] 
> [[image https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773594c2.wixmp.com/f/5bb8db6d-0550-411b-a51e-24b51e9b6cf0/dj5ypcl-cad3d114-7bef-4599-af35-5bcdf0b58c2e.png?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..r3Epx1peyAQAm-8HVauLDgrJ1w9k2w2u6hy9xxXeB1o]]
> -
> This one was a lot of fun, given how ambiguous Hiway's appearance is. I always pictured them being kinda serpentine with a hint of gecko movement, given how they seemed to move around quite effectively while the facility was flipped, also through ducts, all the while still being powerful enough to haul persons and furniture.
> The eye stalks are probably my favourite touch and I think add to the eerie-yet-endearing vibe I was aiming for.
> -
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+ Officer Ingrid Raddagher (mask off) - Find Us Alive" hide="- Live Ingrid Reaction"]]
> [[image https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773594c2.wixmp.com/f/5bb8db6d-0550-411b-a51e-24b51e9b6cf0/dj5ypd3-902cb04d-61b4-48cc-9b22-26f2334d309d.png/v1/fit/w_606,h_865,q_70,strp/raddagher_by_johnnodwarf_dj5ypd3-375w-2x.jpg?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..dQ7Fk8tA-mSgS5APFZAg-BUYXMSkl1RS5CjN6kaqKsQ]]
> -
> My personal mental image of what she looks like with the accessories off. Doodled it while our watch party was catching up on some episodes. Anyways she's just like me fr fr ong or something
> -
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+ Nari needs an ibuprofen" hide="- I HAVE AN ANEURYSM"]]
> [[image https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773594c2.wixmp.com/f/5bb8db6d-0550-411b-a51e-24b51e9b6cf0/dj5ypda-0459b403-cc5a-4cc7-9ec8-9d442e2c1b50.png/v1/fill/w_221,h_124,q_80,strp/ibuprofen__by_johnnodwarf_dj5ypda-fullview.jpg?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..s3m_XWtnj_7IwPCHItSxh0u51jqm_jSBxROwxDBFlhA]] 
> -
> I was hesitant to include this because of how simply incredible it is, but I felt I had to
> -
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+ Is This Loss? - Find Us Alive" hide="- I'm not coping you are"]]
> [[image https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773594c2.wixmp.com/f/5bb8db6d-0550-411b-a51e-24b51e9b6cf0/dj5ypdn-c563c867-ab6f-4cc2-a62a-7e63c266ed56.png?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..qDdx6rqKPqcVCNvDZUIGUPiNOY9c6mDXmdXS3w6rxAc]]
> -
> I don't remember if they managed to reattach Raddagher's fingers from way back when, should probably check. Also this is the last shitpost for now, promise
> - 
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+ 2024 Artex #3 - Find Us Alive" hide="- omg they're all here!!!"]]
> [[image https://i.imgur.com/YW15KhR.png]]
> -
> My final image for 2024's art exchange for [https://www.wikidot.com/user:info/a-random-treestump A Random Treestump]. My gifts felt incredibly underwhelming up until now so I felt another was warranted.
> -
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+ 2024 Artex #2 - Midnight The Cat" hide="- don't you fucking test a cat that safety is off"]]
> [[image https://i.imgur.com/hNEFayv.png]]
> -
> My second image I made for [https://www.wikidot.com/user:info/a-random-treestump A Random Treestump], this time of a relatively niche character who I quite enjoyed.
> -
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+ 2024 Artex #1 - Find Us Alive" hide="- homosexual foreshadowing"]]
> [[image https://i.imgur.com/nifl8OL.png]]
> -
> The first of the drawings I made for [https://www.wikidot.com/user:info/a-random-treestump A Random Treestump] and also my first ever FUA piece! These are the mental interpretations I had at the time and this piece was based off of the early dynamic of Ingrid and Nari.
> -
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+ SCP-8015 - A Fighting Chance" hide="- Uwahh! So majestic!"]]
> [[image https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773594c2.wixmp.com/f/5bb8db6d-0550-411b-a51e-24b51e9b6cf0/dij7zjp-3a87bce8-4fc8-44d7-9263-da1cd4ee411d.png?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..HYqTIKTU1HUvJ9KznPKW6zfBgIqSklOZPJlxJ6T_0ME]]
> -
> I stumbled upon 8015 and damn it, fantastical wish-giving dragon with an ambiguous description? I just couldn't resist!
> -
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+ SCP-8106 - Attempted Murder Monster" hide="- He's so goofy"]]
> [[image https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773594c2.wixmp.com/f/5bb8db6d-0550-411b-a51e-24b51e9b6cf0/dij7zh5-11d3830f-0a7d-4310-90c4-1432a90dfa70.png/v1/fit/w_655,h_698,q_70,strp/scp_8106_by_johnnodwarf_dij7zh5-375w-2x.jpg?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..fgcTxZObngU33ZW2seim077_UndkqxSdoanCH4WCe3I]]
> -
> 8106 the type o'fella to trip over his own shadow
> -
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+ Mobile Task Force: Lambda-12 (Kinkshamers) Insignia" hide="- These cuhs are so freaky"]]
> [[image https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773594c2.wixmp.com/f/5bb8db6d-0550-411b-a51e-24b51e9b6cf0/dijh472-58f0e814-e79b-4c9a-a56e-22b8641364c7.png/v1/fit/w_600,h_600,q_70,strp/lambda_12__kinkshamers__by_johnnodwarf_dijh472-375w-2x.jpg?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..xIS0XQIXktaP06feSZP5d3CA9-hSzUq59EMNEnLWr-w]] 
> -
> My first honest-to-god actual contribution to the wiki! I was perusing the MTF list when I noticed Lambda-12 lacked an insignia and thought it'd be fun to take it upon myself to make it. 
> I settled on a thumbs-down with some bondage, it was intuitive enough given that hands and arrows are an established motif.
> -
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+ MTF: Lambda-12 (Kinkshamers) Insignia - First Design" hide="- Dripping Time ~ Sub Sub Sub"]]
> [[image https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773594c2.wixmp.com/f/5bb8db6d-0550-411b-a51e-24b51e9b6cf0/di2bi66-1d87862e-d9e0-4ddc-b84b-4b3799e86b61.png?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..VoeZImwmM8p62uw9Mh_o9rxauJmK3N3aAqqH6lxGiDc]]
> -
> The original design that ended up not going through because I DM'd the wrong folks. In retrospect I'm glad I gave myself the chance to revise as there was too much clutter in this one for my liking. 
> Still might give the current one another pass-over tho
> - 
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+ SCP-6668 - Infestation" hide="Rats Rats We Are The Rats"]]
> [[image https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773594c2.wixmp.com/f/5bb8db6d-0550-411b-a51e-24b51e9b6cf0/di47q9e-2d944854-1841-44d7-b2a3-098459e16d70.png/v1/fill/w_1280,h_1842,q_80,strp/scp_6668_by_johnnodwarf_di47q9e-fullview.jpg?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.._o2a1us5v0WoDHMSVHVdKnJ5ZjkBXp4j9qVlorWNCGA]]
> -
> Probably one of my best! I drew this after looking through my stuff and realising I had basically nothing beyond Series I.
> -
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+ SCP-682 (my generic take)" hide="- You already know who dis is"]]
> [[image https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773594c2.wixmp.com/f/5bb8db6d-0550-411b-a51e-24b51e9b6cf0/di2bhwa-4bb30252-6816-4542-95f4-e6bba1872099.png/v1/fill/w_1064,h_751/scp_682_by_johnnodwarf_di2bhwa-pre.png?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..dmff5sdv0qeoFDhe8Go-esgDxonVhwql9rj6VVVAOxE]] 
> -
> I'm rather fond of this one. Sure, 682 with a fur coat is overdone, but I still like it. I took other steps to make him appear more alien as well, such as the backward thumbs.
> -
[[/collapsible]] 

[[collapsible show="+ SCP-682 (Doodle)" hide="- More of the same really"]]
> [[image https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773594c2.wixmp.com/f/5bb8db6d-0550-411b-a51e-24b51e9b6cf0/di2bhpl-b084667c-977c-47e9-9ba0-0ef4e17494ce.png/v1/fill/w_1280,h_1167,q_80,strp/scp_682__doodle__by_johnnodwarf_di2bhpl-fullview.jpg?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..uwlAHMItiJ3fb8l37vfDaSA9gXS2PTegObqgKZ57mx8]]
> -
> I quite enjoy giving 682 those little knuckle-walking limbs.
> -
[[/collapsible]] 

[[collapsible show="+ SCP-166 Doodle (again)" hide="- ngl I adore this goober"]] 
> [[image https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773594c2.wixmp.com/f/5bb8db6d-0550-411b-a51e-24b51e9b6cf0/dj5yowx-b1aaefd2-d708-4e0a-92ec-146c6c26ac9c.png?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..KUCUVoCSlgX_On4X2KgmEjSC-8DAwY3QA_m5ahuzjAo]]
> -
> My final(ish) take on Meri's look
> -
[[/collapsible]]

 [[collapsible show="+ SCP-166 doodle" hide="- This goober be so tranquil"]]
> [[image https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773594c2.wixmp.com/f/5bb8db6d-0550-411b-a51e-24b51e9b6cf0/di2bgzq-9571ea15-dd8d-444a-9c30-ff00a8cea9b5.png?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..LzR59nbBnlx4rZRN2pNeyROD2uax49rvDGBO2Bh0Kqg]]
> -
> I just like drawing her.
> -
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+ SCP-166 - Asthma edition" hide="- IRIS WHERE'S MY INHALER"]]
> [[image https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773594c2.wixmp.com/f/5bb8db6d-0550-411b-a51e-24b51e9b6cf0/di2bh8t-bb8a9515-b9d9-45d0-b759-03fc94ec4545.png?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..82ZC7HZ_cKL1PLrL2dWGVD1M2gMsDgY5wB7pXfTqs7Q]]
> -
> I can't help but feel that the whole 'horrible anomalous asthma' part of 166 is a bit neglected 
> -
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+ SCP-Inspired skateboards" hide="- ever been punched in the side of the head by a scooter rider?"]]
> [[image https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773594c2.wixmp.com/f/5bb8db6d-0550-411b-a51e-24b51e9b6cf0/di2bgr1-98b02952-e717-4570-8a60-c7f88a462c1c.png/v1/fill/w_1280,h_1244,q_80,strp/scp_inspired_skateboards__old__by_johnnodwarf_di2bgr1-fullview.jpg?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..XBVy2nwP3Xrw1-uJol3ePHwzXASffMeLP9-Fd2-7ZlY]]
> -
> These were some skateboard designs I whipped up for a design class, drawing from 682, 001 proposals and 3000 respectively. 
> -
[[/collapsible]] 

[[collapsible show="+ SCP-001 - S.D. Locke's proposal (spraypaint)" hide="- oh god oh fuck my paint its melting"]]
> [[image https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773594c2.wixmp.com/f/5bb8db6d-0550-411b-a51e-24b51e9b6cf0/di2bgcw-bc3b0b61-3101-4a70-a1df-00b81127fed5.jpg/v1/fill/w_1280,h_320,q_75,strp/scp_001__s_d__locke_s_proposal____streetart_by_johnnodwarf_di2bgcw-fullview.jpg?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..e33vVzQ7izEllsAZiIF7GVwxSo_qVErQOtMQzHAzCrk]]
> -
> I don't quite remember when I painted this but it was a while back. Possibly my first landscape spray that still holds up if I do say so myself!
> - 
[[/collapsible]]

+++ :3
